tasktexts.tasktext: The super villain table is an excerpt of the powered person table. Provide a query on the powered person table that reproduces the super villain table.
A query for all super heroes having no cape.

A query for the names of all powers of Young Nastyman and the number of the comic they first appeared in, ordered by their appearance (newest first). If two powers appeared at the same time, sort them alphabetically by their name.

solution.referencestatement: SELECT power, comic FROM HasPowerSince WHERE alias = 'Young Nastyman' ORDER BY comic DESC, power ASC;
